Desc: Increase Atmosphere to boost customers' Satisfaction, bear.
Collect customer feedback to improve operations and get every store to reach 5-star ratings!
The higher a store's rating, the more paying customers, bear.
Build traffic stores to increase the number of customers during each business operation, bear!
Build Atmosphere stores to increase Atmosphere and boost customers' Satisfaction.
You can only build one inner ring store per round, but there's no limit on upgrades.
Customers sometimes leave tips. Remember to collect them promptly.
